segments.text: I'm having problems with my computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For some reason it won't turn on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you checked the connections on your computer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are cords that connect your computer to a power outlet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the cords keep it from turning on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It won't turn on if the cords aren't connected .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try it and see if it works .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that I will , thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should work , but let me know if it doesn't .
segments.speaker: S2
